blocks.name: cnmptid
blocks.content: The identity function is continuous. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-May-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnmptid(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cv(s0)), co(c1, ccn, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cv(s0)), co(c1, ccn, c1))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cv(s0)), co(c1, ccn, c1))), diffsw(s0, w0))
  syl5eqelr(cmpt(s0, c0, cv(s0)), co(c1, ccn, c1), cres(cid, c0), w0)
  eqtri(cres(cid, c0), cmpt(s0, c0, cv(s0)), cres(cmpt(s0, universe, cv(s0)), c0))
  reseq1i(cid, c0, cmpt(s0, universe, cv(s0)))
  dfid4(s0)
  ax-mp(wceq(cres(cmpt(s0, universe, cv(s0)), c0), cmpt(s0, c0, cv(s0))), wss(c0, universe))
  ssv(c0)
  resmpt(s0, c0, universe, cv(s0))
  syl(w0, wcel(cres(cid, c0), co(c1, ccn, c1)), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c0)))
  idcn(c1, c0)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

thm cnmptid(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ s0)‚àà(c1[Cn]c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà(TopOn ` c0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ s0)‚àà(c1[Cn]c1)), d(s0, c1))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ s0)‚àà(c1[Cn]c1)), d(s0, w0))
  syl5eqelr((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ s0), (c1[Cn]c1), (= |` c0), w0)
  eqtri((= |` c0), (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ s0), ((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ s0)|` c0))
  reseq1i(cid, c0, (s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ s0))
  dfid4(s0)
  ax-mp(((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ s0)|` c0)=(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ s0), c0 ‚äÜ ùïå)
  ssv(c0)
  resmpt(s0, c0, universe, s0)
  syl(w0, (= |` c0)‚àà(c1[Cn]c1), c1 ‚àà(TopOn ` c0))
  idcn(c1, c0)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

blocks.content: A constant function is continuous. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-May-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)

thm cnmptc(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c2, ccn, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c2, ccn, c3))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c2, ccn, c3))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c2, ccn, c3))), diffsc(s0, c4))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c2, ccn, c3))), diffsw(s0, w0))
  syl5eqelr(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c2, ccn, c3), cxp(c0, csn(c1)), w0)
  fconstmpt(s0, c0, c1)
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(cxp(c0, csn(c1)), co(c2, ccn, c3)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0)), wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c4)), wcel(c1, c4))
  cnconst2(c2, c0, c3, c4, c1)
}

thm cnmptc(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àà(c2[Cn]c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà(TopOn ` c4))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àà(c2[Cn]c3)), d(s0, c2))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àà(c2[Cn]c3)), d(s0, c3))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àà(c2[Cn]c3)), d(s0, c4))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àà(c2[Cn]c3)), d(s0, w0))
  syl5eqelr((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1), (c2[Cn]c3), (c0 √ó { c1 }), w0)
  fconstmpt(s0, c0, c1)
  syl3anc(w0, (c0 √ó { c1 })‚àà(c2[Cn]c3), c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c0), c3 ‚àà(TopOn ` c4), c1 ‚àà c4)
  cnconst2(c2, c0, c3, c4, c1)
}

blocks.name: cnmpt11
blocks.content: The composition of continuous functions is continuous. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-May-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)

  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cmpt(s0, c0, c1))

  fco(cmpt(s1, c6, c7), c6, cuni(c3), cmpt(s0, c0, c4), c0)

  fmpttd(s0, c0, c1, cuni(c3), w0)
  rspcdva(s1, c4, c6, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cuni(c3)), wcel(c7, cuni(c3)))
  eleq1d(c7, cuni(c3), c1, wceq(cv(s1), c4))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c6, wcel(c7, cuni(c3))))
  sylibr(w0, wral(s1, c6, wcel(c7, cuni(c3))), wf(cmpt(s1, c6, c7), c6, cuni(c3)))

thm cnmpt11(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àà(c2[Cn]c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c4)‚àà(c2[Cn]c5))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà(TopOn ` c6))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(s1 ‚àà c6 ‚Ü¶ c7)‚àà(c5[Cn]c3))
  ‚ä£ (s1 = c4 ‚Üí c7 = c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c6)

  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)

  ‚ä£ d(s1, c6)

} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àà(c2[Cn]c3)), d(s0, c2))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àà(c2[Cn]c3)), d(s0, c5))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àà(c2[Cn]c3)), d(s1, c0))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àà(c2[Cn]c3)), d(s1, c2))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àà(c2[Cn]c3)), d(s1, c5))
  eqeltrrd((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1), (c2[Cn]c3), ((s1 ‚àà c6 ‚Ü¶ c7)‚àò(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c4)), w0)
  mpbird(w0, ((s1 ‚àà c6 ‚Ü¶ c7)‚àò(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c4))=(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(((s1 ‚àà c6 ‚Ü¶ c7)‚àò(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c4))` hs0)=((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)` hs0)))
  sylib(w0, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(((s1 ‚àà c6 ‚Ü¶ c7)‚àò(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c4))` hs0)=((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)` hs0)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(((s1 ‚àà c6 ‚Ü¶ c7)‚àò(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c4))` s0)=((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)` s0)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, (((s1 ‚àà c6 ‚Ü¶ c7)‚àò(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c4))` s0)=((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)` s0))
  3eqtr4d((((s1 ‚àà c6 ‚Ü¶ c7)‚àò(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c4))` s0), ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)` s0), ((s1 ‚àà c6 ‚Ü¶ c7)`((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c4)` s0)), c1, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0))
  eqtrd(((s1 ‚àà c6 ‚Ü¶ c7)`((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c4)` s0)), c1, ((s1 ‚àà c6 ‚Ü¶ c7)` c4), (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0))
  fveq2d((s1 ‚àà c6 ‚Ü¶ c7), ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c4)` s0), c4, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0))
  syl2anc((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0), ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c4)` s0)= c4, s0 ‚àà c0, c4 ‚àà c6)
  fvmpt2(s0, c0, c4, c6, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c4))

thm cnmpt2c(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)‚àà((c3[tX]c4)[Cn]c5))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà(TopOn ` c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1))

} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2)‚àà((c3[tX]c4)[Cn]c5)), d(s0, c5))

blocks.name: cnmpt22
blocks.content: The composition of continuous functions is continuous. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-May-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: cnmpt22f
blocks.content: The composition of continuous functions is continuous. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-May-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: cnmptkc
blocks.content: The curried first projection function is continuous. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Mar-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnmptkc(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cmpt(s1, c1, cv(s0))), co(c2, ccn, co(c2, cxko, c3))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cmpt(s1, c1, cv(s0))), co(c2, ccn, co(c2, cxko, c3)))), diffsc(s1, c0))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cmpt(s1, c1, cv(s0))), co(c2, ccn, co(c2, cxko, c3)))), diffsc(s1, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cmpt(s1, c1, cv(s0))), co(c2, ccn, co(c2, cxko, c3)))), diffsc(s1, c3))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cmpt(s1, c1, cv(s0))), co(c2, ccn, co(c2, cxko, c3)))), diffsw(s0, w0))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cmpt(s1, c1, cv(s0))), co(c2, ccn, co(c2, cxko, c3)))), diffsw(s1, w0))
  syl5eqelr(cmpt(s0, c0, cmpt(s1, c1, cv(s0))), co(c2, ccn, co(c2, cxko, c3)), cmpt(s0, c0, cxp(c1, csn(cv(s0)))), w0)
  mpteq2i(s0, c0, cxp(c1, csn(cv(s0))), cmpt(s1, c1, cv(s0)))
  fconstmpt(s1, c1, cv(s0))

  xkoccn(s0, c3, c1, c2, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: xkofvcn
blocks.content: Joint continuity of the function value operation as a function on continuous function spaces. (Compare ~ xkopjcn .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Mar-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: cnmptk1p
blocks.content: The evaluation of a curried function by a one-arg function is jointly continuous. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Mar-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)

  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c8), co(c2, ccn, c4)))

blocks.name: txconn
blocks.content: The topological product of two connected spaces is connected. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: imasnopn
blocks.content: If a relation graph is open, then an image set of a singleton is also open. Corollary of Proposition 4 of [BourbakiTop1] p. I.26. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 14-Jan-2018.)

thm imasncls(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
